attributes.action: Make the five basic human needs free for all
attributes.additional_details:
As many of us are now aware, the technology, resources and wisdom are now available to us to ensure that all people globally can have their five human needs are catered for with no hindrance by the monetary system.

The five human needs are - food, shelter, love recreation and clean water.

We are proposing that the government ensures Aeroponic farms, monitored by automated computer systems, a small number of farmers and engineers, are constructed so that people can access fresh, nutritious food, 24hrs a day.

We are now able to print houses using 3D printing technology, thus there is also no excuse for homelessness or people living in an uncomfortable shelter. We propose that the government ensures people are housed comfortable.

All factors, or excuses, such as money, law or policy, are no longer excusable as relevant reasons for malnutrition, poor diet and homelessness.

Let us move towards a system that abolishes unnecessary suffering. It's possible, right now.
